allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Simplify custom interest input in profile edit

- Merged custom interest input into single multiselect
- Allow direct text input with enter key in multiselect
- Removed separate text input field for custom interests
- Existing custom interests now appear in options list

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add tag-based interest input with enter key support

- Installed and integrated streamlit-tags library
- Replaced multiselect with st_tags component
- Users can now type and press enter to create interest tags
- Suggestions from predefined list appear as autocomplete
- Tags can be removed by clicking on them
- Simplified profile edit form logic

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Revert to multiselect + text input for interests

- Removed streamlit-tags dependency
- Multiselect for predefined interest options
- Separate text input for custom interests with enter key support
- Custom interests auto-add on enter keypress via on_change handler
- Display added custom interests below input field

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Revert to original interest input implementation

- Multiselect for predefined interest options
- Separate text input for custom interests (comma-separated)
- Existing custom interests preserved in text field
- Simpler form-based approach without session state complexity

EOF
)")
Bash(git add app.py pages/ .gitignore README.md requirements.txt)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Migrate to Streamlit multipage app structure

- Created main app.py as unified entry point with home page
- Moved dashboard and level test to pages/ directory
- Removed separate run_*.py launchers
- Updated navigation to use sidebar instead of bottom buttons
- Added python-dotenv for environment variable loading
- Updated README.md with new structure and usage
- Archived old run files

Benefits:
- Single app instance instead of multiple separate apps
- Better UX with sidebar navigation
- Reduced memory footprint
- Industry-standard Streamlit multipage pattern
- Cleaner project structure

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "refactor: Rename page files to English-only names

- Renamed 1_ðŸ“š_ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ.py to 1_dashboard.py
- Renamed 2_ðŸ“Š_ë ˆë²¨í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸.py to 2_level_test.py
- Updated README.md to reflect new filenames
")

Bash(git commit -m "refactor: Simplify app structure with auto-redirect

- Changed app.py to simple entry point with auto-redirect
- Dashboard is now the main home page
- Removed page numbering (1_, 2_) for cleaner navigation
- Updated README.md with new structure

Navigation:
- First visit: Redirects to dashboard
- Existing users: Redirects to dashboard
- Sidebar only shows: dashboard, level_test
")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: Remove sidebar navigation, add page buttons

- Set sidebar to collapsed state in all pages
- Added navigation button in dashboard to level test
- Added back button in level test to return to dashboard
- Cleaner UI without sidebar clutter
")
